name: AFibAtrialFibrillation_ClinicalConditionGrouping
title: AFib (Atrial Fibrillation)_Clinical Condition Grouping
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for the AFib (Atrial Fibrillation) Clinical Condition Grouping.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Clinical Condition Grouping - AFib (Atrial Fibrillation) and utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Data Element Scope: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Clinical Condition Grouping - AFib (Atrial Fibrillation) and utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Clinical Condition Grouping - AFib (Atrial Fibrillation) and utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Exclusion Criteria: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Clinical Condition Grouping - AFib (Atrial Fibrillation) and utilization in patients/users connected health.)
